title: KTCS (AM)
text: KTCS (branded as ‘’simulcasting KTCS FM on AM 1410") is a <a href="radio%20station">radio station</a> serving the <a href="Fort%20Smith%20metropolitan%20area">Fort Smith metropolitan area</a> with a <a href="Country%20music">New Country</a> format. The station broadcasts on <a href="AM%20broadcasting">AM</a> frequency 1410 kHz and is currently under ownership of Big Chief Broadcasting Co. "
